summary: Director-level digital strategy and innovation leader with proven ability to manage complex, multi-site digital projects under budget constraints. Experienced in digital marketing, project governance, product development, analytics, and building high-performance teams to drive business growth and organizational effectiveness. Known for aligning initiative strategy with executive goals and delivering measurable results across multiple regions.

experience.title: Director of Digital Innovation and Strategy
experience.description: Directed centralization of resources and projects; standardized reporting, campaign management across properties; collaborated with the CEO and VP of digital to develop project plans, manage timelines and work streams; provided status updates to senior management; promoted to Director of Online Operations; created strategic initiatives, product development, marketing intelligence, planning and implementation for digital media properties; defined product requirements and created statistical models; established guidelines cross-functionally; built consensus on priorities and strategy.

experience.title: Director of Ad and Online Operations
experience.description: Created, maintained and presented regular campaign status and metric reports; developed ad-hoc reports to support strategic planning; contributed to revenue recognition by ensuring impressions were accurately reported; enforced productivity, quality and process requirements; liaised with external parties for services; reviewed and managed inventory issues; optimized campaigns; used web analytics (Omniture, Web-Trends) for analytical reports; configured campaigns on exchanges (Google AdX, OpenX, Six Apart); implemented impression verification and view-through pixels.

experience.title: Director of Online Operations
experience.description: Project managed CMS centralization and standardized all interactive ad campaigns and traffic reporting across multiple properties; developed project plans and managed work streams; managed third-party sales agent relationships and RFPs; integrated Omniture SiteCatalyst and Google Analytics; produced analytics reports and dashboards; led transition to Google DFP ad serving; managed SEO/SEM for niche sites; budget approximately $500,000 annually; supervised a team of five marketing staff; conducted competitive analysis and led business development for local email marketing launches.

experience.title: Marketing Consultant
experience.description: Researched and developed business plans for expansion; studied competitors' online marketing campaigns; assisted in creating an internal product database with real-time inventory and popularity metrics; provided technical support for website updates.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Created marketing pieces for DMA seminars and conferences; identified data discrepancies and proposed resolutions; developed and implemented a benefits data audit process; profiled and filtered client data per requested parameters.

experience.title: Senior Support Analyst
experience.description: Collaborated with IT teams and vendors to resolve hardware and software issues; configured user networks and systems; diagnosed and supported network connections; used NetWare and Windows 2000 to create user IDs and manage permissions.

experience.title: Information Systems Intern
experience.description: Trained users on Microsoft Outlook and office components; troubleshooted helpdesk queries; configured network servers and deployed remote software installations.

education.school: Long Island University College of Management
Hofstra University Frank G. Zarb School of Business
